subject: Two Clips for Rees in Margaret's folder.
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi Rees.  I've put two clip in my folder (thought I'd send a separate post in case the 
announcements get lost in the shuffle.)

Go to Files > Margaret Downey > Radio Sweep - manual > and look for the files titled "Chuck 
Clarke" and "Tell him I love him."  :-)

Margaret
